privacy-intro: The following privacy policy governs how Kronikea (hereinafter referred to as "we", "our", "us") collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal information when you use our website (hereinafter referred to as "the Site"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your data. By using the Site, you agree to the terms outlined in this privacy policy.
collect-intro: When you use our Site, we may collect the following types of information
collect-1: Personal Information: We may collect information such as your name, email address, and other information you voluntarily provide when registering or creating your profile.
collect-2: Login Information: We may collect information about your use of the Site, including your IP address, browser type, visit times, and the pages you have viewed. This information is collected automatically through cookies and similar technologies.
collect-3: User-Generated Content: When you post content on the Site, such as stories, comments, or images, this information may be collected and publicly displayed.
use-intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes
use-1: Providing and Improving Our Services: We use your personal information to enable you to use our Site, provide you with features and services, and enhance your user experience.
use-2: Personalization: We may use your information to personalize your experience on the Site, including recommending content based on your preferences.
use-3: Communication: We may contact you via email or other means to inform you of updates, news, or to respond to your inquiries.
share-intro: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for direct marketing purposes without your explicit consent. However, your information may be shared in the following circumstances
share-1: Site Usage: Your personal information, including the content you post, may be visible to other users of the Site in accordance with your privacy settings.
share-2: Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating, maintaining, and improving the Site.
share-3: Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required by law, to protect our legal rights, or in response to a court order or government request.
securty-intro: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from loss, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.

about-intro: Welcome to Kronikea, the online platform dedicated to literary and artistic creativity and the sharing of unique stories.
about-mission-text: At Kronikea, we believe in the power of words and imagination to create fascinating worlds. Our mission is to provide a space where writers, aspiring authors, and storytelling enthusiasts can express themselves freely and share their captivating stories with the world. We believe in the importance of diverse voices and perspectives and thus encourage creativity in all its forms.
about-offer-1: On Kronikea, you can create, publish, and discover a multitude of stories, fictional characters, and imaginary places. Whether you're an experienced writer or writing for pleasure, our platform is designed to allow you to share your creative talents. You'll find a variety of genres ranging from science fiction to romance, fantasy, and much more.
about-offer-2: But Kronikea goes beyond words. We also provide a space for visual artists. You can publish images of your artistic creations, providing visual support to authors and a space for artists. Whether it's illustrations of your characters, maps of your imaginary worlds, or other forms of art, Kronikea allows you to bring your creations to life in a visual and immersive way.
about-community-text: Kronikea is much more than just a platform for writing and art; it's a community of individuals passionate about storytelling, creativity, and artistic expression. Our community is a place of inspiration, idea exchange, and collaboration. We encourage our members to interact, provide constructive feedback, and support the efforts of fellow creators, whether they are writers or artists.
about-read: If you have questions, suggestions, or simply want to chat, please don't hesitate to contact us. We're always excited to hear from our users and help them on their creative journeys.
about-thanks: Thank you for being part of the Kronikea community. Together, we create extraordinary worlds through words and images.
feedback-intro: We greatly value your feedback and ideas for improving our website and making your experience even better. Your input is invaluable in helping us evolve as a creative platform. Please use the form below to share your suggestions, recommendations, and ideas for enhancements or changes you would like to see on Kronikea.
feeback-1: We encourage you to be as specific as possible in your suggestions. Whether it's a new feature, a user interface enhancement, an idea to promote creativity, or any other proposal, every idea matters to us.
feeback-2: We take all suggestions seriously and strive to review them thoroughly. However, please note that we cannot guarantee the implementation of every suggestion, but we consider each one carefully to improve the overall experience of our community.
feeback-3: Thank you for contributing to making Kronikea even better! Your creativity and feedback are essential to our ongoing success.
feeback-4: After submitting your suggestion, our team will review it and keep you informed of any implementation or response to your suggestion. We appreciate your commitment to Kronikea and look forward to reading your innovative ideas to advance our creative platform.
